title: Uprize
description: The story of Dutty Boukman, leader of the Maroon slaves who sparked the Haitian Revolution, the largest slave uprising in the Western Hemisphere.
starring: Andre Allen, Taraji P. Henson, Gabourey Sidibe, Anthony Anderson
altHero: Andre Allen as Dutty Boukman leading men in rebellion
alt1: Haitian men walk through the jungle
alt4: closeup of Dutty and another man with gritted teeth
